required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single-dose and Multiple-dose Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of DBPR108 Tablets in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-Label, Parallel-Cohort, Single-dose and Multiple-dose Phase I Study of DBPR108 Tablets in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase I study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of single-dose and multiple-dose of DBPR108 tablets in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients.

detailed_description.textblock: This study aims to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics characteristics, single-dose and multiple-dose of DBPR108 tablets in Chinese Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients. The 30 eligible patients will be randomized to receive 50 mg, 100 mg, or 200 mg DBPR108 tablets.

primary_outcome.measure: Peak plasma concentration (Cmax) of DBPR108 tablets
primary_outcome.description: Cmax of DBPR108 tablets will be assessed after single-dose and multiple-dose administration

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of DBPR108 tablets in plasma
primary_outcome.description: AUC of DBPR108 tablets will be assessed after single-dose and multiple-dose administration
T1/2 of DBPR108 tablets will be assessed after single-dose and multiple-dose administration

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of Distribution(Vz/F)of DBPR108 tablets
primary_outcome.description: Vz/F of DBPR108 tablets will be assessed after single-dose and multiple-dose administration
Apparent clearance(CL/F) of DBPR108 tablets will be assessed single-dose and multiple-dose administration

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in dipeptidyl peptidase-IV inhibition rate
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in dipeptidyl peptidase-IV inhibition rate will be assessed after single-dose and multiple-dose administration

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in active glucagon-like peptide1 concentration
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in active glucagon-like peptide1 concentration will be assessed after single-dose and multiple-dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of patients with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 1 months
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day11).
secondary_outcome.description: ECG monitoring includes P-R, QT and QTc intervals in ms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 1 months
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring includes respiratory rate and pulse in times per minute

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 1 months
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring includes systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure in mmHg.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 1 months
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring includes body temperature in degrees Celsius

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in physical examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day11).
secondary_outcome.description: Physical examination includes mucocutaneous, lymphonodus, head and neck,chest, abdomen, spinal column, musculoskeletal, nervous system

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day11)
secondary_outcome.description: Routine blood test includes white blood cell count, platelet, neutrophilic granulocyte count, lymphocyte count and monocyte count in 10^9 /L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day11)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test includes total protein, albumin and albumin in g/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day11)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test includes alanine aminotransferase, aspartate aminotransferase, amylase, alkaline phosphatase and in U/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day11)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test includes ureophil, glucose, triglyceridein, total cholesterol, high-density lipoprotein, low-density lipoprotein, sodium, potassium, chlorine, calcium in mmol/L

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day 11)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test includes total bilirubin and serum creatinine in umol/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine urine test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day11)
secondary_outcome.description: Routine urine test includes the count of leukocyte, and red blood cell in high-power field.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine urine test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within screening period (Day-21 to Day-15), baseline period (Day-7 to Day-1), and before discharge (Day11)
secondary_outcome.description: Routine urine test includes glucose, protein, ketonein in negative or positive.

arm_group.description: 10 patients will be randomized to receive 50 mg DBPR108 tablets.
10 patients will be randomized to receive 100 mg DBPR108 tablets.
10 patients will be randomized to receive 200 mg DBPR108 tablets.

intervention.description: DBPR108 tablets, oral, once daily on Day 1 and Day 3-9 for a total of 8 doses.

overall_official.affiliation: Beijing Anzhen Hospital, No.2, Anzhen Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing, China
Beijing Anzhen Hospital, No.2, Anzhen Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing, China
